template.name: Template Server IBM IMM SNMPv2
template.description:
Template Server IBM IMM version: 0.15 Overview: for IMM2 and IMM1 IBM serverX hardware
MIBs used: IMM-MIB Known Issues: description : Some IMMs (IMM1) do not return disks version : IMM1 device : IBM x3250M3description : Some IMMs (IMM1) do not return fan status: fanHealthStatus version : IMM1 device : IBM x3250M3description : IMM1 servers (M2, M3 generations) sysObjectID is NET-SNMP-MIB::netSnmpAgentOIDs.10 version : IMM1 device : IMM1 servers (M2,M3 generations)description : IMM1 servers (M2, M3 generations) only Ambient temperature sensor available version : IMM1 device : IMM1 servers (M2,M3 generations)

item.name: Overall system health status
item.description: MIB: IMM-MIB Indicates status of system health for the system in which the IMM resides. Value of 'nonRecoverable' indicates a severe error has occurred and the system may not be functioning. A value of 'critical' indicates that a error has occurred but the system is currently functioning properly. A value of 'nonCritical' indicates that a condition has occurred that may change the state of the system in the future but currently the system is working properly. A value of 'normal' indicates that the system is operating normally.

item.name: Hardware serial number
item.description: MIB: IMM-MIB Machine serial number VPD information

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE}: Temperature
item_prototype.description: MIB: IMM-MIB Temperature readings of testpoint: {#SNMPVALUE}

trigger_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE}: Temperature is above warning threshold: >{$TEMP_WARN:""}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

trigger_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE}: Temperature is above critical threshold: >{$TEMP_CRIT:""}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

item_prototype.name: Ambient: Temperature
item_prototype.description: MIB: IMM-MIB Temperature readings of testpoint: Ambient

trigger_prototype.name: Ambient: Temperature is above warning threshold: >{$TEMP_WARN:"Ambient"}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

dependency.name: Ambient: Temperature is above critical threshold: >{$TEMP_CRIT:"Ambient"}

trigger_prototype.name: Ambient: Temperature is above critical threshold: >{$TEMP_CRIT:"Ambient"}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

item_prototype.name: CPU: Temperature
item_prototype.description: MIB: IMM-MIB Temperature readings of testpoint: CPU

trigger_prototype.name: CPU: Temperature is above warning threshold: >{$TEMP_WARN:"CPU"}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

dependency.name: CPU: Temperature is above critical threshold: >{$TEMP_CRIT:"CPU"}

trigger_prototype.name: CPU: Temperature is above critical threshold: >{$TEMP_CRIT:"CPU"}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

item_prototype.name: {#PSU_DESCR}: Power supply status
item_prototype.description: MIB: IMM-MIB A description of the power module status.

trigger_prototype.name: {#PSU_DESCR}: Power supply is not in normal state
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check the power supply unit for errors

item_prototype.name: {#FAN_DESCR}: Fan status
item_prototype.description: MIB: IMM-MIB A description of the fan component status.

item_prototype.name: {#FAN_DESCR}: Fan speed, %
item_prototype.description: MIB: IMM-MIB Fan speed expressed in percent(%) of maximum RPM. An octet string expressed as 'ddd% of maximum' where:d is a decimal digit or blank space for a leading zero. If the fan is determined not to be running or the fan speed cannot be determined, the string will indicate 'Offline'.

trigger_prototype.name: {#FAN_DESCR}: Fan is not in normal state
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check the fan unit

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPINDEX}: Physical disk part number
item_prototype.description: MIB: IMM-MIB disk module FRU name.

trigger_prototype.name: {#SNMPINDEX}: Physical disk is not in OK state
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check physical disk for warnings or errors

trigger.name: System is in unrecoverable state!
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check the device for faults

trigger.name: System status is in critical state
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check the device for errors

trigger.name: System status is in warning state
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check the device for warnings

dependency.name: System status is in critical state

trigger.expression: {Template Server IBM IMM SNMPv2:system.hw.serialnumber.diff()}=1 and {Template Server IBM IMM SNMPv2:system.hw.serialnumber.strlen()}>0
trigger.name: Device has been replaced (new serial number received)
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Device serial number has changed. Ack to close
